name: df-substr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(csubstr, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cxp(cz, cz), cif(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cmin, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)))), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), caddc, cfv(c1st, cv(s1))))), emptycls, wss(co(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfzo, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), cdm(cv(s0))))))
comment: Define an operation which extracts portions (called _subwords_ or _substrings_) of words. Definition in Section 9.1 of [AhoHopUll] p. 318. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)
